description: Aston Villa: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Aston Villa: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Aston Villa: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Villa in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
Our BBC Radio WM expert Mike Taylor is on hand with all his thoughts on the goings-on at Villa Park.
